alert.note: Alert for West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:11PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN CIBOLA COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM MDT... At 311 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Acoma Pueblo, or 15 miles southwest of Laguna Pueblo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Acoma Pueblo, New Laguna, Seama, Paraje and Encinal. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 105 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Accumulations of small hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains
